info.description: An interface used by every MDM Delivery Tool. All tools that wish to work with the Core service have to provide these endpoints as well as contact the /register endpoint on Core on bootup.
info.title: MDM-Tool

tags.name: Endpoints
tags.description: Endpoints that every tool has to implement

get.summary: Returns the current status of the run
get.description: Checks the run and provides a summery of the current state

200.description: Able to get a status message

post.summary: Initiates a run with a specified ID
post.description: Starts the tool by fetching the properties related to the run ID. This endpoint is called by the Core service when a user has initiated a run.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: An id of a run stored on Core

200.description: Successfully started the tool with fetched properties
